Homage to the assembly of the inexhaustible worlds in the ocean of lotus treasury worlds in the ten directions, the inexhaustible ocean of worlds of subtle dusts, the eternally abiding Three Jewels of equality in the three times.
Universally for the five categories:

The celestial lords of the worlds, the parents of the nine realms who are beyond the world, the various good and virtuous friends, the donors of the ritual arena, and the sentient beings in the realm of inexhaustible remainder, all vow to eliminate the various hindrances, take refuge and repent, and repent with utmost sincerity:
In the various existences of beginningless cyclic existence, the offenses produced by the actions of body, speech, and mind,
Just as the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas repent, I now confess in the same way.
Having repented, with utmost sincerity take refuge and bow to the Great Compassionate Vairocana Buddha, and with utmost sincerity rejoice:
You should also deeply give rise to a joyful mind and rejoice in all the accumulations of blessings and wisdom,
In the practices and vows of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, the blessings produced by the three vajra karmas,
The wholesome roots accumulated by Pratyekabuddhas, Sravakas, and sentient beings, all of which I rejoice in.
Having rejoiced, with utmost sincerity take refuge and bow to the Great Compassionate Vairocana Buddha, and with utmost sincerity make requests:
Again, visualize the Buddhas sitting under the Bodhi tree, each requesting them to turn the Dharma wheel,
All the lamps of the world sitting in the Bodhi arena, the eye of enlightenment blooming to illuminate the three realms of existence.
All Tathagatas, lords of the three realms, who are about to enter parinirvana without remainder,
I wholeheartedly request them to remain for a long time, not abandoning their compassionate vows to save the world.
Having made the request, with utmost sincerity, take refuge and bow to the Great Compassionate Vairocana Buddha, and with utmost sincerity dedicate the merit:
The blessings of repentance, rejoicing, and requesting, I wish never to lose the bodhi mind,
Among the wondrous assembly of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, always be a good friend, never abandoning,
Far from the eight difficulties, born without difficulty, abiding in the wisdom of past lives, adorned with the characteristics of the body,
Far from foolishness and delusion, endowed with compassion and wisdom, able to fully fulfill the pÄramitÄs.
Wealth and happiness abundant, born in a superior family, with extensive and prosperous retinue,
Four unobstructed eloquences, ten masteries, six supernormal powers and meditations all perfect,
Like Vajra Banner and Samantabhadra, the vows and praises and dedications are also like this.
Having dedicated the merit and made the vows, with utmost sincerity take refuge and bow to the Great Compassionate Vairocana Buddha, and then continue as usual.
Recite this verse of purity together:
All dharmas are like reflections, pure and spotless,
Unattainable when grasped or spoken of, all arising from causes and karma.
